attributes.action: Acknowledge that he was wrong in saying that Spain is a G20 member
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is ONLY a de-facto member due to being part of the EU.

Do the right thing and come back to the house and correct yourslef

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions which call upon the PM to "recognise" or "acknowledge" something, as they do not clearly call for a recognisable action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
